description: Variation of Conditions 1 and 4 of planning permission dated 14 August 2018 (RN: 17/10714) for demolition of existing roof structures (excluding chimneys), erection of new mansard roof and associated works in connection the use of the 5th and new 6th floors as 1 x studio; 3 x 1 bed and 1 x 2 bed residential units (providing one additional unit) (Class C3). (Retrospective application) (Site includes 51-53 Rupert Street); NAMELY the removal of the fire escape door of the bedroom of flat 49/51 to match the Fire Strategy plan and to extend the deadline to 14th September 2019 for the completion of works for the removal of the railing to the front fifth floor parapet; partial removal of the rear gantry at sixth floor level, removal of gantry access door at the rear of 47 Rupert Street and making good of the roof and creation of an internal corridor to the rear of the new sixth floor flat at 49/51 Rupert Street.
decision_conditions: Dvpmt in accordance with approvd plans
+1 Design ext appearance OK in CA
Hrs bldg wks resi amenity adj occ
DES No plant etc on roof unless on drwgs
